content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mining at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) 
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) 
-  Transport belt group (position (-17.5, -51.5) to (-12.5, -51.5)) that connects the mining drills

### Iron Plate Production at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0)) 
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) that puts iron ore into the furnace
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) that takes iron plate from the furnace
-  Transport belt group (position (-12.5, -46.5) to (-12.5, -49.5)) that connects the inserter and the furnace

### Storage at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Wooden chest (position (-16.5, -47.5)) 
-  Burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5)) that puts items into the chest

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using inserter but having no source items
-  Make sure to have source items before using an inserter to put items into another entity
### Errors when mining but having no fuel
-  Make sure to have fuel in the burner mining drill before mining
### Errors when smelting but having no ingredients
-  Make sure to have ingredients in the furnace before smelting
### Errors when placing items but having no space
-  Make sure to have space in the entity before putting items into it

### NAMESPACE
*   `insert_item`: a function that inserts an item into an entity. It has been invoked with `Prototype.IronOre` as the item to insert, but failed due to lack of a nearby entity that can accept iron ore.
*   Important variables:
    *   `inserter1`: an inserter entity
    *   `burner-mining-drill`: a burner mining drill entity
    *   `stone-furnace`: a stone furnace entity
    *   `iron-ore`: the item being mined
    *   `iron-plate`: the item being produced
    *   `coal`: the fuel being used by the burner mining drill and inserter
